tweets.text: @_alastair makes for a fun hobby https://t.co/NmXEBnVn8A
gotta say having a video recording of where you were at in a project last night makes it easy to remember exactly what you did and need to do next, so that's nice
RT @RoPanuganti: @ThunderScott626 OBS real name no gimmicks

Had a good session this evening- got all of the layers from the Observable notebook rendering, and added some checkboxes to turn them on and off. Thanks to everyone who hung out! https://t.co/lZ8LiCOT4n
The best part of having a robot write some of your code occasionally is that now when everything goes wrong it can always be it's fault

Okay- taking a break from the stream to make some tea, but we've hit our first goal. We have a dot-density map translated over to Vue, except this time we rendered the dots in canvas, and the census tract outlines in SVG to get the best of both worlds. https://t.co/cToWQudkO1
I was like "if these dots don't show up at 10px they are not there at all" and and lo and behold https://t.co/hIbxsALJvs
okay I made a mistake but I don't hate it https://t.co/JoUMK0tHUw

Okay philosophical question: if GitHub co-pilot writes the comment for your code, is that comment useful in any way (ie, it was self-evident to a robot, and I suppose comments should be for non self-evident things?)

Gonna do an evening livecoding stream- I am so lucky to have clients that let me work in the open like this! Tonight we are continuing the journey of translating a prototype in an Observable notebook to a Vue app (guest starring GitHub co-pilot) https://t.co/e6nn4xrhkj https://t.co/i8D6am43qe

I am falling more and more in love with the pattern of combining SVG + canvas views of maps, overlaid together, for the best combo of performance and visual fun- business in the front, party in the back
I present to you all, punk rock New York state https://t.co/yF25juuag3
give me like $25k or so and I'll make a 6-part documentary series where we spend an hour in a different parts of the country hanging out with snow plow people

I still think about this short documentary on a tow truck driver I saw 10 years ago, especially on snowy days like today, would love to see a similar snow plow ride-along documentary series https://t.co/5ngJ6aP58W

I am stoked for band practice today. The songs are starting to sound really good, really tight.
If a band I'm in ever makes it to a late-night show... I'm totally inviting every musician I know to come on with me. Would be a party.
